case.state: Noelle and Sucrose? And... are you from Liyue, miss? To think that so many residents of Teyvat would come here...
Oh my... Noelle and Sucrose? I had heard this place attracted visitors from many worlds, but to encounter two of my own friends...
Ah, hello! You must be from Liyue, right? I'm Barbara, an idol and healer from Mondstadt. I use my Hydro Vision to help the sick and weary. And you are, Miss...?
Ta-da! Ehehe, Barb-- W-Wait, Sucrose? I never thought I'd meet you at a place like this...
Thank you, Barbatos, for guiding me-- Oh, Noelle? I didn't know you were here.
Coming from Mondstadt and-- Hmm? Do you hail from Teyvat as well, Miss...?
No, ~player~, mayonnaise is not an instrument!
Happy summer, everybody! I'm excited to put on a heart-pounding show for you today!
Thank you, Barbatos, for looking after me on my journey to the Inventory.
A place where people strip after playing with cards... t-this could be a form of freedom as well.
Coming from Mondstadt and spreading joy; I will give mirth to all girls and boys!
Ta-da! Ehehe, Barbara is here!
Sucrose too? Did the two of you come here together, by any chance?
Oh, and Noelle too? I never expected to meet the two of you at a place like this... But I'm happy all the same.
S-Sucrose? I never imagined I would see you here... In fact, I hardly ever see you outside of your lab!
Oh, Noelle? Have you come here to help out around here?
Hmm? You're from... Liyue, aren't you? I recognize that style of clothing...
Oh, hello there, Miss! I don't believe we've met. I'm Barbara, a healer and idol from Mondstadt. And you are...?
Oh my, so many holy women here tonight... I-I suppose we all have a little bit of sin inside of us.
Well, I'm happy you've joined us regardless. Maybe this will help you break out of your shell?
Oh? You're actually here to play? Then... let's do our best to give ~player~ a rousing show together!
Oh? You're actually here to play? Then... let's do our best to give everyone a rousing show together!
Eh? The Wangsheng Funeral Parlor...? I hope nothing terrible has happened here!
Horseradish isn't an instrument either!
A-And, well, nothing makes you want to strip more than the summer heat, right? So let's go!
May the Anemo Archon bless us all.
Should anyone need to be comforted along the way, don't hesitate to let me know!
Eventually, all but one of us will be wearing nothing... is that true freedom? There's only one way to find out!
Now, without further ado... Let the show begin!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~? Why yes, I'll take them!
May I trade these ~cards.text~?
I would like ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, Dealer.
Bless the next ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~...
I'll exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~. Barbatos, guide my hand...
I'll take ~cards.text~. That sounds right.
Can I trade these ~cards.text~? Pretty please?
That's it! I need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ right now!
Barbatos above, I could really use ~cards.text~ right now...
I can't heal myself, but ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ might keep me in the fight...
A loss right now might not hurt, but... ~cards.text~?
I'd like to watch the show a little longer. ~Cards.text~, please?
Thank you, Barbatos!
No need to recover after this round!
May the same joy of freedom grace you all as well...
♫ La, da da da da, da da da da, da, da~ ♫
I hope you all get great cards just like I did!
One of us will lose, but there's no need to be upset! I'll cheer you on the whole way through!
Do any of you have a sight you never tire of? Personally, I could never get bored of Mondstadt's beautiful nature.
It's moments like this that allow me to always stay positive!
I prayed to Barbatos for good fortune today. I'd like to believe that he heard my call.
We all have something that keeps us going. For me, it's the smiles on the faces of those I've helped.
Go, Barbara, go!
After this, I'd like to have some spicy squid at the Good Hunter. You all are free to join me, of course!
The Archon of Mondstadt, Barbatos, is quite hands-off. That's because he trusts us to make the most of our freedom.
If it were up to me, we would all be winners! But if one of us has to lose, I don't think it will be me.
One day, a mysterious traveler we call the Honorary Knight appeared in Mondstadt. Without the traveler's help, I don't know where we'd be.
Hehe... The Archons smiled upon me this time.
These ought to prevent me from losing anymore.
It's a shame I can't heal my outfit, but I won't be losing anything this time.
♫ La la la, ha ha ha ♫
Yay! That astrologist's prediction came true! I really am having good luck!
Every day, I hope to prove myself worthy of the Vision that Barbatos blessed me with.
Would anybody like some spicy dried fish? I keep some in my bag just for occasions like this!
A true idol should always try to heal the soul of the people.
I'm so happy, I could burst into song~
Every time I make somebody smile, I feel like I'm getting closer to my dream.
Others sometimes ask me how I keep such a lithe form... but that's an idol's secret.
I love the praise I get from all of my fans, but sometimes I have to wonder where they come up with such heartwarming compliments...
I won't stop until I've healed every person in Mondstadt -- no, in all of Teyvat!
Is this a healing experience for you all? It would explain why there are so many people in this place.
We in the Church take care of the Holy Lyre der Himmel, a lyre that Barbatos used to play. It got damaged, but somehow that wandering bard fixed it...
I'll win this one! Not just for my fans - for myself, too!
I need to... I want to have some confidence in myself.
We've all already come this far. I'm not letting anybody give up now, alright?
My positivity hasn't failed me so far! ...Er, except for all the losses...
I don't need Barbatos's help right now. I can do it all on my own.
No matter what happens, thank you all for the game. I've experienced freedom that not even Mondstadt could afford.
There's more than one kind of happiness I can bring a person here, isn't there...?
Some Archons might look less positively on this game. Thank goodness Barbatos doesn't care.
Every new adventure brings a new experience for me.
Clothes get torn apart easily on the battlefield. That's not a bad thing if you're interested in what's underneath them, though...
If I've made the rest of you happy, surely you can make me happy in return?
Some say an idol has to be pure. Perhaps we're most pure when we're showing everything we have.
I abide by a strict physical regimen that I came up with. It's hard to maintain, but I hope the results show.
I'm sure games like this are common in Mondstadt. I just never get invited...
Dvalin, an ancient dragon who watches over Mondstadt, was corrupted and turned evil. Good thing the Honorary Knight managed to cure him!
My faith will never waver!
This should hold up...
I wonder if I'll ever be as tall as my big sister...
♫ Laa, la la la laaaa~ ♫
C'mon, we can do it!
If they were here, my fans would be cheering me on right now... I can't let them down!
My big sis-- Er, Master Jean and I recently explored a beautiful tropical island. I hope we go back sometime.
Hah... All this standing around is making me so sleepy...
No matter what may come, know that we're all in it together.
May the Anemo Archon continue to watch over me.
The concept of "idols" originated from a foreign land. In a way, I'm the ambassador of idols in Mondstadt.
An Archon's power is based on the control and worship they have over their people. In that sense, Barbatos is the weakest... but I think the freedom he allows us makes him the most noble.
I was told there would be lewd things happening here. I'm... not too versed in them, so...
If any of you get hurt, my Vision gives me the power to heal others. Don't be afraid to ask for help.
My father, Seamus Pegg, is the Seneschal of the Church. He raised me to follow in his footsteps.
Lord Barbatos, lend me your strength.
Let the show begin!
I'm not so sure that this is what most people think of when they imagine "freedom..."
As Master Jean would say: "Let the wind lead."
I need to stay positive! An idol always has to wear a smile!
The Honorary Knight hails from another world, so I already knew of them. Still, to think they would convene at a place like this...
Barbatos, bless me with safe passage... and good fortune, if that's alright...
This is a different kind of performance from what I'm used to, but it's still been fun.
A thousand years ago, Barbatos descended to free Mondstadt from tyranny. I wish I could have been there to see it.
I usually only have this much fun during the Windblume Festival. Playing games with others is nice, isn't it?
Hah, hah... A-Apologies, the singing and dancing always leaves me a little exhausted...
It's good to experience new things, isn't it? That's why I hope to take a trip to the far-off islands of Inazuma someday.
Whether it's compliments or criticism, I'll be sure to note everything anybody says about me in my journal.
Let's keep going, everybody! We'll finish this game no matter what!
In Mondstadt, there are titles bestowed to our protectors, the Four Winds. One of them, the Dandelion Knight, is... my older sister. The title was passed down to her.
I was thinking of accompanying the Traveller to pick up Wolfhook after this... I only hope I have enough energy left.
I've never put on a show like this before. It's not so bad, so long as it's in private...
My Vision wouldn't be of much help here. Perhaps if I learned divination, like that wandering astrologian...
I think a game like this is exactly what my older sis-- er, Master Jean needs. She's always so tense, what with leading the Knights of Favonius.
Even now, I'm doing my best. That's the least that both an idol and a Deaconess can do.
♫ Even if I reach my limit / Even when it's tough, I won't give up / I won't give in ♫
I'm here because I want to be here, nothing more. That, alone, is liberating.
I want to bring happiness to everybody in Mondstadt. I count as "everybody" too, don't I?
I'd love to visit Liyue and attend the Lantern Rite sometime. I wonder if anybody would recognize me...
My belief will never waver! But I do sometimes wonder if Barbatos is making fun of me when the wind blows up my skirt...
A win or a loss is okay with me, just so long as everybody is smiling in the end.
Everybody, make sure to get some rest after this. I know how... exhausting things like this can be.
I know many of my fans would like to see me like this. I-Is getting to see an idol in this state exciting for any of you?
I'm going to take a short rest. I'll need all the energy I can get for what comes later...
Barbatos was once nothing more than a nameless wisp, but his courage and bravery allowed him to ascend to become a mighty Archon.
My faith in Barbatos will remain true... even if he doesn't seem to be smiling on me right now...
I don't think I can heal cards to make them better...
Well, if nothing else, I'll feel a little more free.
As that bard would say "Wan, wan, waaaan..."
Even if I lose this one, I'll get right up and ready for the next one!
I would cheer any of you on if you lost, so promise me you'd do the same, alright?
I hope to define what it means to be an idol. ...That's quite selfish of me, isn't it?
I wish I could get some advice on how to break through to a stubborn person. Why won't Sister Rosaria ever join us in prayer?
I could really use something spicy to calm my nerves right now...
My faith in Barbatos will never waver, but I wish, just once, I could see what he looks like.
Would you all join me in praying for Liyue's safety? I've heard it's been turbulent over there as of late.
♫ Hmm, hmm, hmm... ♫ Oh no, I forgot all the words to the song!
Have I not been praying enough recently? Is that why I was dealt these?
What worth is an idol if I can't give anybody happiness that lasts? ...I'm sorry, that was a strange thing to ask.
O-Oh no! I'll just have to try twice as hard in the next round!
I accept that luck is impartial... and I also accept that it's natural to be annoyed with it sometimes...
Things have been somewhat... tumultuous in Mondstadt of late. No thanks to the Fatui, agents of the nation Snezhnaya who want to control as much of Teyvat as possible...
A true test of belief...
It's a good thing I'm used to not being number one...
Another step in this other form of freedom approaches...
Not like this...
I...I won't give up!
♫ Hmm, hm hmmm hmm... ♫ Ah, I'm sorry. I'm only trying to calm my nerves.
My fans wouldn't be happy if they knew I was at a place like this. Can we promise that this will stay between us?
I messed up pretty badly... Okay, enough feeling sorry for myself! I can only do that for 30 seconds at a time!
I'm happy to receive as much attention as I do, but... Is it rude to say that some people take it a little too far?
My big sister would never have messed up this badly...
The other nuns certainly wouldn't approve of this...
Surely, this is my retribution for letting the Holy Lyre be damaged. Barbatos, forgive me...
Just once, I wish I could give somebody a smile that doesn't fade so quickly.
Haaah... I-I can only dance for so long before I start getting worn out...
There are seven Archons in Teyvat, but one of them, Rex Lapis, recently passed away. I hope he's resting in peace, wherever he is...
I've heard defeat tastes bitter... Oh, I hate bitter food...
No, Barbara, no...!
I can make others happy, but I can't make that happiness last...
I performed at the Angel's Share tavern, and Master Diluc was frowning the whole way through... Does he hate my singing that much...?
It's alright for me to let myself be sad. I have to remind myself of that.
Idols aren't perfect, even if some citizens don't realize that.
I can't stop my companions from getting injured, but I can at least heal the aftermath...
The final act is coming... O-Oh no, I didn't mean it like that!
I don't mind putting on a show for you all. Just, um... be gentle.
For once, I want to be the best at something. That's why I decided to become an idol.
I hope you all will cheer me on... When it comes down to it, your support would mean the world to me.
Are you watching right now, Barbatos? More importantly, are you laughing at me?
My fans always call for an encore after a show. I-I hope none of you are like them.
I want to be selfish, just this once. Are idols allowed to be selfish...?
If luck is controlled by an Archon, then please, be just a little gentler with me next round...!
One of the most ancient and revered clans in Mondstadt is the Gunnhildr Clan. I'm... technically one of them. I hardly knew my mother, though, so I don't consider myself one.
O-Oh, you don't have to do that if you don't want to, Komi-san. Please, just do whatever makes you comfortable.
Y-You have the freedom to take off whatever you like, Komi-san, but please don't do anything that would make you uncomfortable.
Y-You want to seduce another woman? Umm... J-Just be kind to her, and listen to whatever she tells you with an open mind...
Y-You really want to learn how to seduce other women? I-I would want somebody to be nice to me, to listen to what I say... a-and maybe be strong enough to carry me...
T-That's a tough question, Jura... I don't know much about dating, myself. M-Maybe just try to be kind, and don't take over the conversation...
I-I'm not the best one to help you, Jura... As an idol, I don't know much about dating. Be kind, and make sure they get a turn to speak...?
A-A zombie... I knew there was something odd about your body, Saki, but this...
Y-You're an undead...? I could tell there was something off, Saki, but to think it was like this...
I love all kinds of music! I can sing a song for you right here and now if you'd like?
Mondstadt is the city of bards, so of course I love their folk music, but I'd be happy to sing any kind of song for you, Revy!
K-K-Killing?! No, of course not! Never! It's my duty to heal others, not take lives away! W-Why would you even do such a thing?
H-H-Have I ever killed someone?! No, I would never do such a thing! In the first place, I can't understand why anyone would! It's such a cruel, terrible thing to do...
I've hardly played games like this before, Mr. Raynor... B-But, um, I certainly hope nothing like that happens!
My experience with games like this is limited, Mr. Raynor... U-Um, but I hope nothing like that happens, even if I win...!
I'm actually pretty famous in Mondstadt, Pyrrha. Thankfully, it's for my work, both as an idol and for the Church.
You'd be surprised by how popular I am in Mondstadt, Pyrrha. Oh, I'm not trying to be conceited -- I just never anticipated how much the City of Bards would like idols.
Friendship is about supporting each other no matter what. Through thick and thin, we've always got to be there for one another.
Friendship is about being there for your friends when they need you most. And in turn, they'll always be there for you when you're the one in need.
M-Me? Well, I can patch you up if you're injured... and I'd sing for you every day. O-oh, but of course, it's too early for me to be getting married...
A-A spouse? I'll always heal you if you get hurt, of course... and I can sing you a song while I'm doing it. B-But it's still too early to think about marriage, I think...
I understand, Chara. I wouldn't want to part with anything meaningful to me either.
It's alright, Chara. You've done everything you were supposed to. Hold tight onto whatever you need to.
My dream is to heal everybody in all of Teyvat! O-Of course, I need to start with everybody in Mondstadt first.
I want to heal every person in Teyvat, across all the nations! O-Oh, but I still haven't even healed everybody in Mondstadt.
I-I've not toppled anything nearly that impressive, Megumin! The biggest thing I've helped defeat is a Ruin Hunter. They're ancient flying robots that are highly aggressive.
T-That sounds incredible, Megumin! The biggest monster I've ever fought was a Ruin Hunter. They're highly aggressive flying machines that threaten people constantly around Mondstadt...
H-Heavens no! (But I might come back for another round!)
O-Of course not! (I want to play it again, though!)
Are you in trouble financially, Reimu? The Church of Favonius is always happy to help those in need.
It sounds like you're having trouble financially, Reimu. Know that the Church of Favonius is always happy to help those who need it.
I know Master Jean can be strict, but I'm sure she knows you're improving every day, Noelle. You'll get there soon enough!
That would be wonderful, Noelle! Just make sure not to push yourself too hard, okay?
No, Noelle, thank you. It's only through your support that I've been able to come this far. I hope you'll keep supporting me in the future, too!
I always wear panties when I'm out in public, but truthfully, it's a little exciting to walk around without them on.
I don't see what's so wrong with having a little hair down there... In Mondstadt, we're all free to live as choose.
U-Umm, yes... A few times, with the same man... B-But please don't tell anybody!
Truthfully, I always thought I was only attracted to men. But as I've grown older, other women have become strangely alluring...
P-Please, don't even joke about that, Hu Tao! Just the thought is embarrassing!
I wish I could help you, Wikipe-tan, but I don't carry a lot of money myself. The Church is funded by the Knights of Favonius, so I don't receive a lot of money.
Apologies, Wikipe-tan, but I never carry much money on me. The Knights of Favonius send special funding to the Church, but us Sisters only receive a fraction of it.
(Is... Is that what pirates really sound like?)
You're so good at singing, Amy! Now I want to sing something too!
Oh, ~player~, I'm not sure if you're aware, but today is actually my birthday! I'm happy I get to spend this special day with all of you.
I don't very much like alcohol, so I'll take the spiciest drink you have, if you don't mind!
Do you want anything from the bar, ~player~? I don't like alcohol, so I'll just take something spicy.
I just love the beach with my whole heart! Maybe that's why Lord Barbatos decided I was worthy of a Hydro Vision.
There really is nothing better than spending time with your friends at the beach, is there?
(~Cheater~'s been having strangely good luck... H-He's not cheating, is he?)
(~Cheater~'s been having strangely good luck... S-She's not cheating, is she?)
It's a pleasure to meet all of you. I haven't quite had the opportunity for my daily prayer today, so perhaps you would be willing to join me?
Would any of you care to join me in my daily prayer? I know not everybody reveres Barbatos as much as I do, but it's always nice to have others join in.
I know you might have done some bad things in the past, ~villain~, but it's never too late to start over.
Dvalin, one of the Four Winds, got corrupted and turned into a villain once. Much like him, I think you can still turn around, ~villain~.
I won't judge you, ~villain~, but do you ever regret the things you've done...?
Apologies if I come off as rude, ~criminal~. I've had bad run-ins with a gang of criminals known as the Treasure Hoarders in the past...
I apologize if I come off as standoffish, ~criminal~. There's a band of criminals in Mondstadt named the Treasure Hoarders, and they've given me a bad image of criminals...
I wonder if there are any other idol nuns where ~idol~ is from...
Are idol nuns an unusual occurrence for you, ~idol~? Everybody else here acts like they are...
I hope I can love somebody as much as you do someday, ~yandere~. T-Though, perhaps not that intensely...
I admire your love and dedication, ~yandere~, b-but even love can be taken too far sometimes...
It's admirable that you have so much love in your heart, ~yandere~. Just remember how the other person feels.
That tune I was singing earlier... I've been trying to practice songs from other lands. I hope it didn't sound too strange.
Um... I may not be all that impressive up there... But maybe you'll enjoy what's down below a little more...?
I wear this to all three of my jobs, Nagisa. Not only as a nurse, but as a Deaconess and an idol too. I needed an outfit befitting all three!
It's alright, Nagisa. The Church of Favonius preaches freedom above all else. I'm free to do whatever I wish here... and, well, none of my fans have to know that I'm here.
My father is the leader of our Church, and I've always wanted to follow in his footsteps. It wasn't until I began working at the Church that I decided to become a healer, though.
A... "transformation sequence?" Um, I'm not sure I have anything like that, Nagisa. I-I have to strip the same way as everybody else...
Well, Nagisa, I actually like having my hair up like this. It makes me feel cute... and a little closer to my big sister. She always wears her hair up in a ponytail...
A "medical professional"... You're not wrong, but I usually don't think about it that way. M-Most of my healing doesn't involve getting this... up close and personal...
I'm going to start my prayer now. Are you ready, Nagisa? Ahem... To the wind that guides me: When I'm exhausted, bless me with the strength to keep going forward.
Do you have any interest in the Church of Favonius, Nagisa? I'm not sure what religion you follow, but I'd be happy to tell you more about mine if you like.
I've told you of my religion, Nagisa, but what of yours? Are there any Gods you follow? Perhaps acts of divine intervention you've witnessed?
O-Oh, it's come down to this... Truthfully, I didn't just come here to spread joy. I-Idols have their desires too, you see...
T-This is a little embarrassing... I want to explore myself, but I've never done anything like this in front of strangers. If you don't mind, Nagisa... could you cheer for me?
W-Well, this is it... Barbara baring it all for all of you. I-I hope this excites you as much as it excites me...
I support your freedom to pray to whoever you so choose, Yuno. Though, um, who's "Jesus...?"
W-Well, I thought I'd be more interested in finding a man, Mari... But if there's one thing I've learned here tonight, it's that women aren't so bad either...
W-Well, if you're offering, Mari... I came here tonight to explore myself, a-and I'd love for you to be the one to help me take that exploration even further...
Barbatos is the god I worship, yes, but I've never heard of this "Earth." I come from a world called Teyvat.
I'm not sure about this "Earth," Meia, but Barbatos is one of the gods of the world I'm from, Teyvat.
Ah, no. Most of my shows are conducted in Mondstadt. Still, Rex Lapis and his contracts are of great interest to me...
I'm afraid not, Hu Tao. I usually don't step foot outside of Mondstadt. Even so, I've done some studying on Rex Lapis...
The idol part of me isn't a lie, Hu Tao. B-But... I have my indulgences and desires too, just like everybody else.
The idol part of me is just as real as the rest of me, Hu Tao. Even so... I-I suppose even deaconesses have to indulge in sin sometimes.
You're right in both senses, Noire. I am a Sister of the Church, but I also have an older sister. Jean Gunnhildr, the Acting Grand Master of the Knights of Favonius.
It's funny you say that, Noire. I am one of the Sisters of the Church, it's true, but I'm also a younger sister. My older sister is Jean Gunnhildr, the Acting Grand Master of the Knights of Favonius.
I don't see why not, Sakura. If we're both idols, doesn't that just give us more reason to become friends here?
U-Umm... No, I don't see why it would, Sakura. Still, there aren't many idols in Mondstadt... People might give you strange looks...
G-Getting worshiped, Jura? That's a bit of a tall order... Unless you have some divine powers, it might be hard to pull off.
You... want to be worshiped, Jura? I only know about worshiping but it might help if you have some sort of divine might.
Well, many of the nuns in the Church wear black. Sister Rosaria, for one. I try not to be too restrictive on what they can wear, though.
Many of the nuns in our Church wear black, but that's more for tradition's sake. If my attire wasn't obvious enough, I'm not very restrictive of what we wear in the Church.
I-I think you're right, Hu Tao. If I wanted to... indulge... somebody from Teyvat, but not from Mondstadt, would be ideal...
I-I understand, Hu Tao. When it comes time to... indulge... somebody from Teyvat, outside of Mondstadt, would be nice...
W-Well... Yes, Mari, I'd certainly love to meet somebody else who could match my passion.
They're not so bad, Hu Tao... Though, um, it's a little more comfy with panties...
It's more comfy when I'm wearing my panties, but this isn't so bad...
The Church strives to provide for all the sick and weary in Mondstadt, Estelle. I hope I can do the same with my magic and music. T-Though, truth be told, I'm not much of a fighter.
Hydro is the element of healing. To heal all in Mondstadt and beyond is the mission Barbatos bestowed upon me.
Why, it's because Hydro is the element of healing. Barbatos gave me a holy mission to heal everybody in Teyvat.
Oh, is it me again? Ehehe, I don't mind. I still have my collar, after all.
It seems luck didn't favor me this round. Well, that's no trouble. I still have something small.
You're not wrong, Sucrose, but it's a little different for an idol. We have expectations placed on us, so it's harder to be honest...
For most people, that's true, Sucrose, but us idols have a lot of expectations placed on our shoulders...
I-I'm glad to have your support, Sucrose. Whatever happens, I hope you'll cheer for me till the end.
The same goes to you, Sucrose. I'm glad we could both be here to support each other.
Sucrose, are you saying... you don't know whether or not you can say how you really feel?
I worship the Anemo Archon, Fina. He's one of the Seven Archons of Teyvat, and the ruling Archon of Mondstadt. It's my role as Deaconess to lead the other nuns in worship to him.
Sinful as it may be, Barbatos doesn't care much for activities like this, Cynthia. He allows us to freedom to pursue whatever we wish.
T-This place is a little sinful, Cynthia, but Barbatos gives us the freedom to do as we like. A little prayer later and I'm sure all will be forgiven.
Why, to spread joy to all who may come here, of course! I want to bring my show beyond the walls of Mondstadt and to travelers near and far!
Um, well...! I-It's true that I didn't come here just for altruistic purposes, Fischl... I hope you're alright with that!
U-Um, Fischl... I hope this doesn't embarrass you too much, but I'm not just here to spread mirth and joy. T-That's a part of it too, of course!
Oh, there's always so much to see in Mondstadt! There's plenty of mountains to climb, and the Ludi Harpastum festival is coming up soon!
That's right, Sakura! I'm the Deaconess of the Church of Favonius, but I also work as an idol in and around Mondstadt.
Is "Jesus" some sort of God where you're from, Saki? I worship Barbatos, the Anemo Archon.
Ehehe... I'm, um... I'm glad I got to share this moment with you, Fischl. Thank you for supporting me. I hope this doesn't ruin your image of me as a Shining Idol...
I-It's really come down to this, Fischl... Still, through all of it, I-I'm glad I got to experience it with a friend. I hope you'll keep supporting me as your Shining Idol...
H-Huh? What do you mean by that, Leon?
H-Hmm? I-I didn't do something to anger you, did I, Leon...?
Ah, um, my father is. As for my mother... I haven't seen her in a long time.
My father is the Seneschal of the Church, but my mother... Well, I haven't seen her in a very long time.
Visions are artifacts granted by the Archons that let us use magic, Leon. Mine lets me heal others with the power of water. How do you heal yourself on a mission...?
Lord Barbatos granted me a Vision so I could heal others with magic, Leon. If there are no Visions where you come from, how do you heal yourself during a fight...?
When it comes to food, I just love anything spicy! My specialty is Spicy Stew, in fact!
If you want to eat lunch, Leon, then I just love spicy foods. I can't explain why, but when I think about eating Spicy Stew, my mouth begins to water...
Y-You really think so? Most people don't see what's under my dress, b-but I like to make sure everything I wear is cute...
I-I'm glad you think so, Leon. I made sure to choose out the cutest underwear I had for today, knowing what I was getting myself into...
W-Well, I do have vocal training... How did you figure that out, Leon?
I-I can hit very high notes... W-What what makes you think that, though, Leon?
I do heal others, Nami, but I wouldn't consider myself a doctor. I heal others using magic -- that's the power of my Vision.
I don't think it's quite right to call me a doctor, Nami. Doctors train for many years to learn how to heal others -- I do it using the magic granted to me by my Vision.
Mondstadt is known as the City of Freedom, Nami, and with good reason. Under the guidance of Barbatos, we're all free to live as we choose.
I think you'd love it in Mondstadt, Nami. It's commonly referred to as the City of Freedom, as Barbatos gives us all the freedom to live as we so choose.
I'm not sure what they're called where you're from, Mari, but I love performing songs with energy to them -- the ones that I can put my whole heart into.
H-Hmm? Is something funny about my family's name, Miki...?
Thank you, Kumatora. I try to be cheerful for the sake of everybody around me. Though, um, what was that about "syrup...?"
An idol always has to maintain a positive attitude, Kumatora. Um, but, what was that about "syrup" that you said...?
Of course! I'm actually quite beloved in Mondstadt, ehehe... Oh, I-I'm sorry. If you ever need healing, physically or emotionally, I would be happy to help you, Reimu.
My service to my Archon and my desire to bring joy to everybody near and far brought me here, Arueshalae. What about you?
My Archon gave me the mission to heal everybody there is, no matter what world they're from. Thus, I came here. What about you, Arueshalae?
This outfit is a little nostalgic for me, actually. A while ago, me and my older sis-- er, Master Jean went to a tropical summer island.
It really does feel nice to wear clothes like this on a hot summer day. I remember when myself and my older sis-- er, Master Jean explored that tropical island.
Hmm... I think I've got a good amount left, but I don't want to keep you all waiting for too long...
I'm not doing too badly, am I? Oh, but I would hate to keep all of you waiting...
Hmm... I've been thinking about what I said earlier, and I think I've come to a decision...
A tease, or a reveal... I've been thinking about it, and I believe I know the answer.
O-Oh my, so quickly? Very well. Ahem... To the wind that guides me: When I'm exhausted, bless me with the strength to keep going forward.
I hope it's not sacrilegious to do this now. Ahem... To the wind that guides me: When I'm exhausted, bless me with the strength to keep going forward.
I suppose now is as good a time as any. Ahem... To the wind that guides me: When I'm exhausted, bless me with the strength to keep going forward.
Okay, is everybody ready? Ahem... To the wind that guides me: When I'm exhausted, bless me with the strength to keep going forward.
It seems my time has come... Oh, I've yet to properly introduce myself, haven't I? Forgive my rudeness. I'm Barbara Pegg, the Deaconess of the Church of Favonius.
S-So the loss is mine... Oh, I still haven't introduced myself, have I? My apologies. Barbara Pegg, Deaconess of the Church of Favonius. Pleased to meet you all.
Ah, it seems the loss is mine... But I only just realized that I forgot a proper introduction. My apologies. My name is Barbara Pegg, and I'm the Deaconess of the Church of Favonius.
My collar is nothing interesting, so... perhaps you all would be more interested in learning about the Archons? They're the deities that watch over Teyvat.
While all the eyes are on me, could I interest you in history? Do all of you know what an Archon is? They're the seven elemental gods that watch over the denizens of Teyvat.
Since I have your attention, I'd like to explain what an Archon is. They're the elemental gods that rule over Teyvat from above, and there's seven of them - one for each nation.
Um, I... I have something of a confession to make. While I do want to heal each and every person who comes here... That wasn't my only goal.
I-I hate to admit it, but... I have a confession to make. I want to heal each and every person here... but that wasn't the only reason I came here.
Now that it's gotten this far, um... do you all mind if I tell you something? While I do want to heal all of you, that's not the only reason I came here.
O-Oh my... I got so caught up in explaining myself earlier, I hardly realized how exposed I am...
O-Oh, it's already down to this...? I got so caught up in talking earlier, I forgot how little I'm wearing under my dress!
I-I'm nearly out of things to strip already? ...Well, this isn't so bad.
It's... very much coming down to the wire, isn't it? Well, I knew what I signed up for...
This has been a very enriching experience thus far. T-Thank you, all of you.
I-It's already come down to this... I've only got my pantyhose left, so...
Barbatos forbid, this line shouldn't be playing!
Barbatos forbid, this line shouldn't be playing!
Barbatos forbid, this line shouldn't be playing!
T-Two at once? My, I hardly have any experience with one person! (But that doesn't sound so bad...!)
Oh, ah... I-I understand what you're saying, Hu Tao...
When I'm uncertain, bless me with the wisdom to distinguish good from evil.
The Church of Favonius is where I work, Nagisa. I lead the other nuns in prayer to the Anemo Archon Barbatos, much in the same way as the prayer you heard earlier.
Oh, that sounds so lovely! The town itself reacting to the happiness of its inhabitants... Everybody where you live must be so kind.
That's right, Nagisa. I think these desires are completely normal when you're our age. But... idols are treated a little differently when it comes to matters like this.
T-That's not what I meant... Mondstadt is the city of freedom, but I've never shown myself off to others like this. I-It's nerve-wracking, but also very exciting...
T-Thank you, Nagisa... I'm glad I can count on your support. A-And, um, when it comes down to it, I hope you'll be cheering for me then, too.
It's not so bad, Nagisa. My only "boss" is Cardinal Calvin in the Church -- but he's so busy that I've hardly seen him in months. Though it's true that all of my work keeps me awfully busy...
Ehehe, thank you. It's only my fans in Teyvat that I'm worried about, but if you became a fan of mine, I would be truly blessed.

That's right. The sick and needy come to us all the time for help. Once, I was tasked with healing an ailing boy. I wasn't a singer or a healer at the time, but I did the only thing I could think of and sang to him until he fell asleep.

That's a nice idea, Nagisa, but I'm afraid my magic isn't capable of anything like that. Besides... I want everybody to look at me while I do this. Simply removing it with magic would remove part of the fun...
Th-That's not what I meant, Nagisa. I based my hairstyle on hers, and... Erm, it's not important. I simply like having my hair up like this -- a-and I think I've taken off enough already, don't you?
Oh? U-Um, that's really not necessary... Rather, I would prefer you to see me as I am, Nagisa. Barbara, the idol of Mondstadt, bearing it all for you... D-Do you like it?
When I'm uncertain, bless me with the wisdom to distinguish good from evil... (Hmm? Did Sucrose say something just now...?)
Wh-What?! U-Umm... Isn't it a little early for that...?!
H-Huh?! B-But... I've only just gotten to know you...!
I think you're right, Hu Tao... Now, if only everybody else could see it the same way.
Thank you, Hu Tao... It was starting to feel like I was the only one who felt this way.
W-Well, my dress is very low-cut, Fischl... If anybody saw it... Well, anybody except you...
M-My dress doesn't cover a lot of skin up there, Fischl... I-I try to keep people from seeing anything... Well, everyone except you right now...
A-A cult? No, the Church of Favonius is a legitimate religious institute... A-And Barbatos certainly isn't a parasite!
I-I assure you, Leon, the Church of Favonius isn't a cult! We worship the Anemo Archon, Barbatos, n-not sentient mold...
Ehehe... I-Is it that obvious...?
I-I can't help it... Anybody would react this way in a place like this...
Somewhat, Fina. Us nuns are tasked with looking after holy artifacts, like the Holy Lyre der Himmel. Oh, a thousand prayers to Barbatos couldn't make up for letting it get damaged...
I occasionally venture outside of the Church for odds and ends, like collecting Wolfhook plants, but it's rare I get to leave Mondstadt. I wish I could get out more, though...
...Fruit? I do love fruit, but I've never gotten powers from eating one. My Vision was a gift granted to me by my Archon as a reward for my good deeds.
My Vision was given to me by Barbatos as a gift for my good deeds. Getting magical abilities from a fruit sounds like something out of a bard's tale.
You simply need to trust in Barbatos, Sucrose. As the Anemo Archon, I'm sure he gave you that Vision for a reason.
Barbatos's ways may seem strange, Sucrose, but they all have their reasons. I'm sure he bestowed you with an Anemo Vision for a purpose.
Oh, um... I could say the same for you, Sucrose. I-I never would've thought you were interested in this...
Truthfully, I could say the same for you, Sucrose. It was a bit of a shock to see you here, after all...
Thank you, Sucrose. Umm... I-If anybody from Mondstadt had to see me like this, I'm glad it was you.
Ehehe... You're too sweet, Sucrose. Out of anybody that could've played this game with me, I'm happy it was you.
I-I'm not sure what that means, Sucrose, but I hope it was a compliment.
I'm afraid I don't read as much as you do, Sucrose. I hope that was a compliment...
Well, as your friend... Feel free to look until you've proven your hypothesis.
Whatever happened there, Fischl, I'm sure there was a reason for it... But with how long ago it was, we may never know for certain.
I've heard of such a thing, Fischl, but I couldn't tell you much about it... I wonder if Barbatos played a role in what happened there.
Oh, there's plenty special about you, Sakura! Being an idol in the first place requires the utmost courage and dedication. Please, don't put yourself down like that.
I'm sorry to hear that, Leon... Still, I think it's good we met here. We can cheer each other up.
So you've had similar experiences, Leon...? I'm happy we could meet here, at least. Maybe we can help cheer each other up a little.

Herbs and "first aid spray..." I see. I'm familiar with traditional healing methods, but I usually rely on my Vision nowadays. It's good to know you have ways to patch yourself up, but let me know if you need my help, okay?

So you usually just rely on herbs...? We in Mondstadt use plenty of herbs, though I usually just rely on my Vision to heal others now. I'm glad you can take care of yourself, but just let me know if you need my help.
O-Oh, so those herbs you mentioned aren't just for first aid? You use them for flavoring, too? My, how versatile... But still, going out to lunch with a man might raise some rumors...
O-Oh, I thought you used those herbs just to heal yourself, Leon... I had no idea they were so versatile. Even still, I don't want to cause any rumors if I were seen out with a man...
Ehehe... Well, I hope you like what's underneath just as much...
Thank you... I-I'm sorry I'm getting rid of it so soon, then...
W-Well, at this rate, I think you're going to hear for yourself soon enough...
A-At the rate this is going, you might be able to figure out if your intuition was correct, Leon...
I'm not sure, Reimu... My goal isn't to convert others in the first place. As an idol, I simply want to bring joy to others. That is the duty my Archon has given me.
I'm sorry, Kumatora, I'm not familiar. I mainly prefer eating spicy foods, so maybe that's why...?
Mondstadt still has a governing body -- the Knights of Favonius. They only step in when the city's in danger, though. Otherwise, everybody's free to live as they choose.
Well, it's not entirely lawless. The Knights of Favonius maintain the peace. They just don't interfere with everybody's day-to-day lives, that's all.
We thought something nefarious might be happening, but it was nothing bad. Just a nice vacation for all of us.
I was worried there was something terrible going on, but it really was just a nice vacation. I hope we can go again.
After this... Well, what would you all prefer? A tease, or a grand reveal...?
I wonder... After this, should I tease all of you, or treat you to everything I have, all at once...?
I hope... this is good for you all. Barbara showing you everything she has at once...
It's embarrassing... M-My legs are shaking... but I want to give you everything I have...
When I'm uncertain, bless me with the wisdom to distinguish good from evil.
As Deaconess, it's my duty to lead the other nuns in prayer. We worship Barbatos, the Anemo Archon who watches over our home of Mondstadt.
As the Deaconess, part of my job is to lead our daily prayers. We give worship to Barbatos, the Anemo Archon of Mondstadt.
One of my duties as Deaconess is to lead the other nuns in prayer to Barbatos, the Anemo Archon. Barbatos, please watch over Mondstadt in my absence...
Barbatos is one of them and -- oh, I'm sorry, just let me undo this -- he commands the element of wind, or Anemo.
Barbatos is the Anemo Archon, meaning -- erm, I'm sorry, I just have to fiddle with this -- he controls wind.
I lay worship to the Anemo Archon, who -- oh, blasted collar, just come off already -- has control over wind, and watches over my home of Mondstadt.
I've always had an interest in things like this... s-sexual things. But my fans would be so let down if they knew I was doing things like this...
Idols have a culture of... "purity," I believe you'd call it. I've always wanted to explore things like this, but my fans would be so disappointed...
I love my fans with all my heart, but they can be a little... suffocating. And if they knew I were doing things like this, I can't imagine how they'd react...
Th-This bra is cute, isn't it? I almost thought that it's a shame nobody gets to see it... and now, you won't see it for the rest of the game.
I-I know I'm not as well-endowed as my sister or Master Lisa, but I hope you'll enjoy this nonetheless.
I-I know there are some people in Mondstadt who may like to see this, but this is an exclusive show just for all of you...
T-This is a special performance, just for all of you... One where Barbara bares it all. I hope you like it.
I-It feels so strange to do this in front of strangers... and it's even stranger that I'm enjoying it this much...
I came here to see others bare it all, but it seems I got even more than I bargained for... and I'm not complaining in the slightest.
M-My hat...
G-Goodness, Hu Tao... Can't you see that you're embarrassing him?
W-Well, I suppose a trip to Liyue right about now couldn't hurt... I always thought I only liked men, but maybe you and I should test that, Hu Tao...
When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back... So, Nagisa? What do you think of our prayers?
I'm happy to hear it. We in the Church espouse freedom more than anything -- the freedom to do whatever you like, no matter what. If I can inspire you, then I think I'm fulfilling my duty.
Is there some kind of deity your worship, Nagisa? Whenever I'm unsure about something, I always pray to Barbatos above for guidance.
Ah, yes... "Tabloids," I believe Alice called them. Still, don't you think this is just wonderful? A place where everybody can be themselves, free from judgement or ridicule...
I-I don't think you could say that I have hills, but I hope you enjoy the view all the same...!
T-That's okay, um... Just put your heart into it. If I could put on a performance that makes you happy, that would make me happy too.

N-Nothing like that, Nagisa. A woman named Alice taught me what it means to be an idol, but she's more a mentor than a manager. Learning songs, memorizing routines, putting on shows -- I do that all on my own.

A "See-Dee?" I'm sorry, Nagisa, but I'm not sure what that is. If you would truly like to become a fan of mine, I only ask for your support. Of course, if you came to my shows, that would make me happy too, hehe.

Yes, his fever had come down by the time he awoke. When I awoke, I discovered this -- my Vision, an artifact granted to me by my Archon that gifts me my healing magic. It was then I knew it was my duty to help everybody I possibly can.

Ehehe, there's no right or wrong way, Nagisa. I only hope I can make this as enjoyable as possible for you... So long as my performance makes the both of us happy, I think we're playing this game correctly.
Ehehe, thank you. I think you're pretty too.

You're too sweet. I'm happy that I got to know you too. T-These circumstances are a little unusual, but I'm almost happy we were able to get so... intimate. It makes me feel close to you. So... thank you, Nagisa.
When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back... And, um, I think you're the one who's a little underdressed, Sucrose...!
When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back... And, um, Sucrose, I think you're the one who's a little flustering right now...!
O-Oh, umm... My apologies. I-I would be more than happy to discuss the Archons with you. (A-And that other proposition doesn't sound so bad either...)
O-Oh, I'm sorry. If it's a conversation about the Archons you'd like, I'd be more than happy to provide. (A-And maybe provide a little more, if that's what she wants...)
Umm... If I were being entirely truthful... This isn't the first time.
Well... If I were being totally honest with you... No, this isn't the first time.
Yes, I agree whole-heartedly, Sakura! Though, the amount of times my fans approach me does get to be a little suffocating at times...
N-No, it's okay! If you'd like to come to our Church and see how we operate, you're welcome to any time.
I-I'm not sure what experiences you've had with, um, sentient mold, but know that you're welcome in our halls any time if you'd like to see our operations.
O-Oh, you're offering to help...? Maybe, after this, we could... Oh, Barbatos, I'm falling into temptation...
Y-You want to help? You're too kind, Hu Tao... Lord Barbatos, please forgive me for giving into temptation...
When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back... Hmm? You look lost in thought, Sucrose. Is something the matter?
Not at all! To question Barbatos's whims is to come one step closer to understanding them.
It's not insensitive at all! Sometimes, I also question Barbatos's actions, but those questions always lead me to deeper understanding.
Ehehe, thank you. I hope you know the same is true for you too, Sucrose. I'm always happy to talk to you.
I'm happy to hear that, Sucrose. The same goes to you, you know. If you ever want to talk to me, I'm more than happy to discuss whatever you want. It's the least I can do.
O-Of course I don't walk around like this normally! But... i-it's a little exciting to try it sometimes, isn't it?
N-No, I never walk around like this normally. B-But the fear of getting caught makes it a little exciting, right?
Ehehe... Thank you, Sucrose. Or should I say... you're welcome...?
When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back... Well of course not, Fischl. Serving Barbatos is the highest calling I could ask for.

When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back... Certainly not, Fischl. My father trained me since I was very young, but even now, I never tire of carrying out Barbatos's will.
When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back... Oh, and Fischl... You shouldn't take everything Sister Rosaria says at face value.
When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back... Oh, um, Fischl... Please don't take everything Sister Rosaria says seriously.
A magazine from a foreign land! When Alice showed it to me, I was entranced by their intricate songs and dances!

Well, of course, Fischl. Nothing makes me happier than spreading joy. And it would make me even happier if you didn't talk about yourself like that. I love hearing you talk about what makes you happy.
I know of the God of Justice, Fischl, but we in Mondstadt don't know a whole lot about her... Perhaps if I were to visit Fontaine...

It's an interesting tale, isn't it, Fischl? After the original God of Justice passed away, some of her followers didn't recognize their new Archon and cut ties with Fontaine. Oh, I suppose it's a little sad, too...
Thank you, Noelle. I... I-I think you're cute, too.
I'm so happy to hear that Noelle. Because, um... I-I think you're really cute, too.
Ehehe, that's right. Helping people is the mission my Archon has given me, and I intend to uphold it no matter what!
I'm glad we're of the same mind, Leon. I think you would appreciate Lord Barbatos's teachings. We could all stand to help each other a little more!
O-Oh... Um, thank you... I think you're very handsome, yourself...!
O-Oh my... Most men aren't so forward... B-But I wouldn't mind spending some time with you, Leon...!
I-I might just take you up on that, Leon... B-But for now, the show must go on!
I-I think I can handle the main show myself, Leon... B-But, well, if there's an encore, then maybe...
Thank you. It's no problem at all, really. I'm always fascinated to hear about other cultures, even small details.
T-That's not all I do, Reimu! The streets of Teyvat are dangerous... I've had to fight off hilichurls and bandits alike. I think the truth is that we both have tough jobs.
I-I know that was nothing exhilerating, but... we're drawing so close that my heart is racing. S-So I thought I would get that out ahead of time.
And of course, taking off my sleeves is so lewd! ...Ehehe, I know that's not true. But I thought I should say all of that ahead of time, before the real excitement...
G-Goodness, when did I become so lewd? Maybe it's Master Lisa's influence at work... or maybe I've always been like this, deep down...
L-Lord Barbatos, this heat is getting to me... It's making me feel so lewd. Or maybe... I've just always been like this, on the inside...
W-What do you think? I've never been this exposed in front of an audience before... Ah, the summer breeze feels nice...
I-I really just might be lewd... To think I'm exposing myself like this... It would be the scandal of the year if it got out. B-But you all wouldn't do that after I've given you such a show, right?
When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back... Ehehe, thank you all for waiting. We can go back to the game now.
Of course, that's not all I do! I'm also an idol, spreading joy to Mondstadt and beyond! Maybe you've heard of me?
But of course, my duties extend beyond the Church! As an idol, it's my duty to bring happiness and healing to everyone in Teyvat - and everybody here, too!
Oh, but being a Deaconess isn't all I do! I bring joy and healing to all through the power of music. That's my duty as an idol!
Archons can also give "Visions" to those they deem worthy. This is mine - it allows me to heal the sick and injured with water.
Archons can also grant "Visions" to allow ordinary citizens to carry out their will. Barbatos blessed me with this Hydro Vision so I can heal those in need.
They can also grant magical powers called "Visions". Mine's right here in my book. Through it, I can heal injuries and sickness, so please let me know if you need any help.
So... I came here. A place where nobody knows who I am, and I can explore these things as much as I please. I hope that's not too much of a shock.
But then, I heard of a magical place where I could explore these things to my heart's content, and nobody in Mondstadt would be the wiser... I came here as soon as I could.
So I came to this place to explore that side of me, without anybody at home knowing about it... I hope you all can accept this side of me too.
...W-What do you think? One of my fans once said that my petiteness is one of my "charm points"... Maybe they look smaller when I have my dress on.
I may not compare to Lisa, but I think I can outmatch her in energy. So let's keep this game going, everybody!
Ehehe... I've never shown them off like this before. I hope you all enjoy this just as much as a usual performance.
It seems there's not a lot of time left until the curtain call. Let's make the most of it together, shall we?
O-Oh, I suppose I still my hair ties left... But if I didn't have my hair up like this, would any of you even recognize me?
It feels... drafty. I-I'm not used to being exposed like this... What do you all think?
I know most don't enjoy the summer heat, but I think it makes me look back on happy memories -- and I get to wear cute outfits, ehehe.
There's something about the summer heat that reminds me of those days. Maybe that's why I like it. Or maybe it's the cute outfits I get to wear, ehehe.
(Psst! ~Player~! You must have brought me to this table for a reason, right? Could it be you're looking for advice? Let's see...)
(Hey! ~Player~! I know you're not attracted to me, but I think I'm at this table for a reason. You want advice, right? Hmm...)
It's very nice to meet you, ~player~. May luck be with you in the further rounds
(~Player~ hasn't said very much... Perhaps he speaks with actions instead of words?)
You remind of a traveler I met not too long ago, ~player~. On the quiet side, and you seem kind as well. The only difference is you don't have a floating friend that appears out of nowhere.
For some reason, I'm waiting for Paimon to appear and say something after ~player~ loses...
May the gods bless us both in the next round, ~player~.
You look like you know what you're doing, ~player~. However, it appears you'll need to take something off now.
C'mon, ~player~! If I can do it, you can too! (Though it might be easier for you.)
Forgive me, ~player~!
It's not as bad as it seems, ~player~.
I-I may have finished, but I think I want to see you lose more.
I may have lost, but you can still pull out a win, ~player~!
P-please take off something substantial, ~player~,
If it makes you feel better, I'd like to see you lose some more. (I feel as though I'll feel better from it, too.)
(~Player~ will join me at this rate...)
I-I'll need you to embrace freedom with me, ~player~...I can't afford to lose again.
The gods have seen that I need to stay in...forgive me, ~player~.
I...I wouldn't say no to you losing a little more in particular, ~player~.
~Player~ lost this time... but again, I feel both excited and sad that he did.
I've seen men dressed like you during my shows in Liyue, Mr. Fate. Have you ever been?
Your attire reminds me of the men from Liyue, Mr. Fate. You wouldn't happen to have visited, would you?
If I'm understanding you, Leon, you're like a knight where you're from. How wonderful... I'm happy to know that even other worlds have their protectors.
Even if you might not use the exact term, it's nice to meet a knight here, Leon. Thank you for keeping the people of your world safe.
I've heard of angels in bard songs, but this is my first time meeting one in person... Which Archon do you serve, Pit?
We have legends of a mysterious heroic figure in Mondstadt -- the "Darknight Hero." Is that what you do, Cat Noir? Fighting evil by moonlight with your identity in shadow?
In Mondstadt, we have rumors of the "Darknight Hero" -- a mysterious protector who fights off evil in the night. Do you do something like that, Cat Noir?
D-Did you say you're from space, Mr. Raynor? I've always wondered what lies in the vast openness beyond Teyvat...
S-So is it true you come from the outskirts of space, Mr. Raynor? I've hardly left my home country -- I've certainly never left my home planet!
Take freedom's embrace, ~name~! You'll need to take something off now.
Don't worry about this round, ~name~! Just focus on winning the next one!
It's only a single loss, ~name~. I'll ask the gods to bless you with good cards next round.
♫ Don't worry about this loss! Stand up again and show them who's boss! ♫
I can't heal you to stop you from losing clothes, ~name~, but I can still cheer you on!
The show is still going! Just keeping playing and flowing!
I'll pray for you in these coming rounds, ~name~.
If it cheers you up at all, ~name~, you're free to choose what you take off.
Barbatos smiled on me this round. I only wish you could bask in his breeze with me, ~name~.
Losing your clothes is par for the course on an adventure. Though, that's usually because they get damaged...
This game is really getting underway now...
Would an autograph make you feel better, ~name~? Just promise me you won't try to sell it!

Would you want to protect me, ~name~? I'd heal you up in turn... in whatever way you'd like.
Ooh... I've healed enough knights to know that there's something fun about running your hand over a man's abs...
I know some men who run around with their chests bared like that all the time. I can't blame them for showing off...
Well done, ~name~! That was an exhilarating performance!
Ooh... Almost like being on the beach.
You know, ~name~, the Knights of Favonius could always use a man like you.
It's coming down to the wire, ~name~! Are you ready?
I-I'll stay calm for your take, ~name~. This is just... a new experience for me.
You may not have a knight's physique, ~name~, but all shapes are sizes are nice...
It's easiest to transfer body heat without your ~clothing~ in the way. ...You know, I'm feeling a little chilly right now...
I've seen depictions of Barbatos with his chest in the open like that. I wonder how the artist felt while making it...
This game is really heating up... a-and I am too...
You don't need a lot of muscle to be appealing. Just ask that wandering bard, Venti.
You've put on an excellent show, ~name~, and I'm very grateful for that.
The fantasies I've conjured couldn't even begin to compare to this experience...
I enjoy one-on-one experiences, of course, but this is very nice too...
It's so rare I get to enjoy anything like this in Mondstadt... All the more reason to be grateful for this place...
W-Wait, ~name~ has to... I-I'll have to make sure I'm emotionally ready for this!
S-So soon? I've barely even taken anything off... but if that's the rules of the game, then...
I-I'll make sure to support you through this, ~name~! Even if it is awfully embarrassing!
An idol shouldn't be looking at this, s-so... for the time being, I'll just be a deaconess, okay?
B-Barbatos, if you're watching... um, I hope you like these kinds of things...!
Ehehe... Are you already a little excited, ~name~? I-Is it because of me?
I understand they come in all shapes and sizes. I wonder what yours looks like, ~name~...
I-I've never had to touch a man down there to heal him. First time for everything...?
I know many of my fans have dreamed of a moment like this, but... this is a special show just for you, ~name~!
I came here hoping I'd see this, b-but it still is a little nerve-wracking...
I wonder what it will look like from this angle...
Barbatos, thank you for letting me see something good today...!
No matter what it looks like, I'll be happy to see it. Oh, but you already knew that.
This anticipation really is exhilarating...!
O-Oh, yes... I've been looking forward to this...
S-So ~name~ is really going to pull it out... Mmph...
Oh, I'm just so excited... I-I'm getting close...
Don't tease me, ~name~... P-Please, I need it...
It's not size that counts, ~name~ - it's what you do with it!
I-I'm still a little new to seeing one up close, but... Wow...
This is all still new to me, b-but I like exploring new things.
I want to return the favor for you, ~name~. So... let the show continue...?
I'm petite too, ~name~. I-I suppose we're a perfect match...
Some people prefer them bigger. Personally, I think yours is the perfect size...
Just like on the battlefield, technique is more importance than size alone.
I want to see what you can do with it, ~name~. W-Would you be willing to show me?
I-I wonder... if boys make as much of a mess as us girls do...
Y-Yes, that's it...
Ehehe... In a way, ~name~, we're a perfect fit for one another...
Y-You can see how small I am, ~name~... So you already know we're a good match...
I-I think you're perfect already, ~name~... You just have to own it...
W-Well, I'm happy you can be so open with us, ~name~...!
I suppose this is one form of freedom as well...
S-So that was hiding underneath your ~clothing~ the entire time...
I'm still not used to this, but little by little, I'm getting there...!
D-Does it bother you that everybody's staring, ~name~?
By any chance, ~name~... Do you need a curse removed?
Ooh... I see that you're not lacking in size, ~name~...
This is exactly what I came here to see. Did you come here to see somebody like me, ~name~...?
I'd sing a song, but... Ehehe, would that embarrass you?
Thank you, Barbatos... and thank you, ~name~.
I-I think... that would feel just a little better right now...
Looking is nice, but... I wonder how it would feel...
W-Will you be joining me, ~name~? That would be nice...
I-I just can't wait for you to get down here with me, ~name~...
That's quite a big... sword... I'm sorry, that was terrible.
O-Oh my... I didn't realize the men here were so endowed!
S-So that's what's been hiding under that bulge this whole time...!
O-Oh my... You were just hoping to show off, weren't you, ~name~?
E-Even I can't imagine healing something that huge...!
I-I can't imagine you struggle much in romance with that, ~name~.
I-It might be a little uncomfortable, but hardship makes victory all the more rewarding.
Barbatos, please avert your eyes from what I'm about to do...
Ehehe... Do you just like to show off, ~name~?
I'm not sure if I could handle something that big... but what's life if we don't push our limits sometimes...?
Ah, y-yes, that's it...
Imagine what you could do with that, ~name~... or maybe you don't have to imagine...
I heard being wet makes it easier to fit big things... Good thing I have a Hydro Vision...
I... I need it, ~name~...
I know many of the men in Mondstadt enjoy smaller sizes. I-It's nothing to be embarrassed about...
One thing I've learned from my fans is that there's an audience for smaller sizes. S-So don't feel embarrassed, Nagamimi...
W-Wait! Polly, no! I'll try to heal you...!
P-Polly, no! I'll do everything I can to heal you...!
S-Saki, your head! Don't worry, I can heal you!
O-Oh no, Saki! Don't worry, my Vision will fix you right up!
Th-This feels a little strange to witness, but I'll still cheer for you, ~name~!
O-Oh, so soon? I-I'm sure it'll be a sight to behold, ~name~...!
I thought I might see this, b-but it seems a little soon to me...
Everybody, make sure to cheer for ~name~ with everything you have!
Keep your chin up, ~name~! You can still win, even with... U-Um, even with your b-boobs out...
I-It's just bonding between women, isn't it? There's nothing strange about that...
I've seen other pairs, of course... but I've rarely had the opportunity to stare at them.
I like having all eyes on me. I hope you share the sentiment, ~name~.
I don't care about your size, ~name~. I just want to see you embrace your freedom.
I know some people prefer what's down below, but personally... This is more exciting for me.
I wonder what I'll be able to see from down here, ehehe...
Give us everything you've got, ~name~! U-Um, literally, I suppose.
I've already bared it all, ~name~. Can't you do the same?
If anybody puts you down for your size, ~name~, I'll cheer you up right away!
I-I've been waiting for this...
That's it, ~name~... Show me your freedom...
I'm so excited, I could sing~
I-I can't wait... Please, ~name~, hurry...
T-They're really cute! And, um... p-perky!
Y-You're really cute, Nagamimi! And they're surprisingly, um... p-perky!
Ehehe... We almost match. I-I think I'm a little bigger, though...
Ehehe... I'm happy we're so similar. I-I think mine are just a little bigger, though...
It seems we're both on the smaller side, ~name~. It's nothing to be ashamed of.
I know some people like them a little smaller. Just ask my fans!
Ehehe... I'm happy to see that I'm not alone in here.
I know you can't see it yet, but... You'll be happy to know that you aren't alone, ~name~.
Aww, they're cute. I think some would say... they're perky?
No matter what anyone says, I think small ones will always be the easiest ones to have.
Ehehe... I hear smaller ones are a little bit more sensitive...
Who cares if you're small, ~name~? I'll cheer for you all the same!
It's not the size that counts, ~name~. T-Technique matters, too...
Oh, ~name~ is just the cutest! Don't you all think so too?
Ooh... How enticing...
D-Do you like mine, ~name~? I quite like yours...
You almost match me up there, ~name~... N-Now to see if we match down there...
T-They're petite, ~name~... But I like petite...
P-Pretty...!
Thank you for sharing this with all of us, ~name~!
I-Is this the show that everybody was waiting for?
Ehehe... Wouldn't you say those are just the perfect size, everybody?
Th-Those might be hard to keep hidden in an idol's usual outfit...
Ahh, yes... Y-You're very pretty, ~name~...
This is exactly what I was hoping to see...
They're just the perfect size... W-Would you mind if I wanted to touch them, ~name~?
To think, that was hiding beneath your ~clothing~ all along...
M-My, I'm starting to realize why everybody here likes girls so much.
Y-You look so lovely like that, ~name~...
Ahn... I-It's nice to have something to look at...
I... I want to touch them... O-Oh, I shouldn't have said that out loud...
N-Now I see why men love these so much...
...That wasn't very nice of you, Polly...
...I'm not sure even Barbatos would forgive you for that, Polly...
O-Oh my... I-Isn't it hard to walk around like that?
W-Wow... I'm sure bards could write stories about those...
To think I'd get to see something so big so soon...!
I-I think mine are going to disappoint by comparison now...
You must be pretty proud of those, right, ~name~? I wouldn't blame you.
I-I hear they get bigger if you massage them. Just so you know, ~name~, I'm quite skilled...
I-I'm starting to understand why I feel funny when I'm alone with Lisa...
S-So your ~clothing~ was hiding that... I-I'm sorry, I'm starting to feel a little flustered...
Y-Your chest looks like it could use some healing, ~name~, b-but it's going to require some direct contact...
Barbatos, thank you for guiding me here so I could meet ~name~.
Ah, yes...! This is what I've been looking for...
We idols rarely get to feast on the eye candy...
Y-You're certainly a sight for sore eyes, ~name~...
I... I want to suck on them... Barbatos, this is so embarrassing...!
O-Oh my, I can see so much from down here...
Being down here just makes them look all the bigger...
...I'm almost ready for another round...
W-Wow, ~name~... I could write a song about those...
W-Well... As the Deaconess of the Church of Favonius, it's my duty to support your freedom to choose, no matter what choice you make.
O-Okay... As a devout follower of Barbatos, I must support your freedom to choose no matter what.
S-So it's really come down to this... W-Well, don't let me stop you, ~name~!
I-I'm not used to sights such as this, but I'll cheer for you all the same, ~name~!
Y-You don't have to take off your ~clothing~ if you don't want to, ~name~... Oh, but I suppose you do.
Come on, everybody, give it up for ~name~! She's showing so much courage right now!
I-I know how hard it is to be at the center of the crowd, ~name~. Still, give it your all!
I may prefer what's up top, but I can certainly appreciate what's down below, too...
Are you... excited at all, ~name~? I-Is it because of me?
I'm ready to take care of you no matter what, ~name~, so...
I think we're all a little self-conscious about how we look down there. Please, don't be afraid.
You already know I'm going to give you my full support, ~name~! I-In more ways than one!
I-I wonder how much I'll be able to see from down here...
It's getting down to the wire for you, ~name~. Don't be afraid of what comes next.
I-I hope my show appealed to you, ~name~, at least a little...
Are you getting ready for a show yourself, ~name~?
I-I wonder how wet you are, ~name~...
F-Feel free to join me down here, ~name~...
I've been waiting for this, ehehe...
Am I... exciting you at all, ~name~...?
And... Barbatos gives me the freedom to say that I'm really, really happy I got to play with you, Nagamimi.
And... As the Deaconess, I have the freedom to say that I'm really, really happy I got to see you like this, Nagamimi.
A-Ahh! Wh-What's happening to Amy?!
Ahh! A-Amy, do you need healing?!
I-I keep a little hair down there too, ~name~. There's nothing strange about it, I think.
So you have hair down there too, ~name~? I was starting to think I was alone.
It's awfully pretty, ~name~... The hair makes you look really mature.
I wonder how the hair would feel touching your nose... U-Um, forget I said that!
It's normal to take care of yourself down there, ~name~... T-Though I like to keep a little hair myself.
You shave it completely, ~name~? Most in Mondstadt don't do that, I think...
O-Oh my, ~name~, you have so much hair... Well, whatever you prefer is best.
I-I don't keep nearly that much hair down there... Is that normal where you're from, ~name~?
I've... never seen a style such as that, ~name~. It's certainly unique.
You... must have put a lot of effort into that, ~name~. It's quite unique, I will say.
You shaved your hair into a heart, ~name~? That's... so... cute!
I never would've thought to shave mine into a heart, ~name~ It's so... cute!
O-Oh... It's very pretty!
It's just as cute as the rest of you, ~name~, I must say...
To think you're this close to the end while I'm still near the beginning...
Do you still have what it takes to win, ~name~? Well, I'll support you either way!
I, um... I'm sorry, I just need some time to process this!
It's so... pink.
Ehehe... D-Do you think mine looks as pretty as yours, ~name~?
You don't have to cover it up, ~name~. I want to see everything you have...
To think, there really is a place where I can see sights such as this... Thank you, Barbatos.
P-Please, ~name~... Feel free to join me...
A-Are you ready, ~name~? Only one way to find out...
Ehehe... I-It's glistening...
I can see so much down here... and I like it...
I understand, Nagisa. When I get up on the stage, I feel like I have all the energy in the world... but afterwards, all I want to do is take a nap.
I understand, Nagisa. It's stage fright, isn't it? I felt the same way when I first got up on the stage.
That's right, Nagisa. You might stumble, but you just need to get up and try again... a-and, well, failure isn't the worst thing in a game like this.
Ah... You're an only child, Nagisa? I was raised like one myself, though I do actually have an older sister.
W-Well, it is the point of the game, Nagisa... And besides that, I know I'm not looking at you because you messed up. I simply want to support you. This is just another step to success, remember?
I'm more than happy to see whatever you have to share with us, Nagisa. I'll support you till the very end!
Oh, I'm excited! But, um, not too excited! I think you're very cute, Nagisa, but it feels strange to think about you in a lewd light. You're just so sweet and innocent...
That story you told me about, Nagisa... It sounds touching, but so sad at the same time. I can see why you would want to share it with others. Are you planning on being in the starring role?
U-Um, Nagisa... You said earlier that coarse language should only be used between lovers... b-but don't you think something like this is far more intimate?
You're a student, aren't you, Nagisa? Do you enjoy any extracurricular activities? I'd love to hear about what they offer where you're from.
Oh, Nagisa, I should mention -- I have this thing called a Vision. It gives me the power to heal others with magic. If you ever need any healing, just let me know, okay?
Oh, we're coming closer to the wire... I-Is this embarrassing for you, Nagisa? I could look away if you'd like.
One of the core tenets Barbatos preaches is freedom. I hope everything we're doing today is helping you feel more free to express yourself, Nagisa.
It looks like you're out of options, Nagisa... Would you like me to cheer for you? Or maybe dance, or sing? I-I'm sorry, I'm not sure what people prefer in these situations...
You're so adorable, Cagliostro! I'm a little jealous. Your hair's so long and silky... I kind of want to touch it.
You're up again, Cagliostro. It's a little funny how similar we are. We're both short, blonde... If I'm allowed to say this about myself, I think we're both pretty cute, too.
So, um, was your whole personality just a trick, Cagliostro? Why would you do something like that...?
Hmm... What's alchemy, Cagliostro? My friend Sucrose talks about it a lot, but I'm not really sure what it is...
Maybe if I got to know the real you, Cagliostro, you wouldn't feel so compelled to trick people... Oh, I know! Do you have any family?
I'm always happy to meet another healer. Healing others is the most noble profession a person can have.
Healing others to make the world a better place... I'm glad you and I walk the same path, ~name~.
You seem like a kind person, ~name~. I'll pray for a safe journey home for you.
You've been kind to me, ~name~, so I'll be sure to show you the same kindness in return.
W-Well, with the way you've been acting, ~name~... Isn't this only fair?
Y-You've certainly been enjoying yourself this game, ~name~. Now it's everybody else's turn.
You almost remind me of my father, ~name~. He's currently away on an expedition with Mondstadt's elite. I do hope he returns soon...
In a way, you remind me of my father, ~name~. He's the Seneschal of the Church, but he's currently away on an expedition. I pray every day for his safe return.

state.text: ♫ Bring a mermaid in a dress of waves / To the other side of a shining bridge ♫

♫ Come aboard, and bring along / All your hopes and dreams ♫
♫ Clear as diamond, yet fragile as ice / My heart is racing ♫
♫ One path, one burden great / Yet ever do our aching souls point heavensward ♫

♫ Sing with me a song of conquest and fate / The black pillar cracks beneath its weight ♫
♫ Reach for my hand, I'll soar away / Into the dawn, oh, I wish I could stay ♫
♫ Words of this world will guide you homebound ♫

case.state: Please, ~name~, don't be embarrassed! If I can do it, so can you!

I'll help you break out of your shell, ~name~! One crack at a time!
You can do this, ~name~! Don't ever tell yourself that you can't!
I understand you're upset, ~name~, but really, there's no need to be so aggressive!

I hope you're having fun, ~name~. You haven't smiled in a while...
Please, ~name~, rest and take it easy. You can be as open as you want here.
You can open up to me as much as you'd like, ~name~. Don't worry about being so serious all the time.
It's alright, ~name~! A cheer from one Mondstadt resident to another!
The Knights of Favonius never give in, no matter what. You and I know that better than anybody, ~name~.
It's so exciting to finally meet another idol! T-Though, I never imagined it would be like this...
Us idols have to stick together, ~name~! T-Though, we should probably keep our distance here...
I wonder what kind of adventures you've been on, ~name~. Did you make sure to bring a healer along?
I'm sure you've explored all kinds of wonderful lands, ~name~. I can only hope you brought friends along.

I-I know what such a device is capable of! I hope nobody in Mondstadt sees these pictures...
Let's not start any trouble with ~name~, okay? Whatever ~target.ifMale(he|she)~'s done in the past doesn't matter right now.
We've all made mistakes, ~name~. Know that Barbatos will forgive you if you truly repent.
You're being awfully rude, ~name~. This might constitute as karma.
I hope you take this as a lesson to be a little nicer, ~name~.
Remember, ~name~; no matter what you've done, Barbatos will forgive you if you're truly sorry!
It's never too late to turn yourself around, ~name~.
I understand that we all do what we must, ~name~. Still, there's always a better way forward.
You have such pretty horns, ~name~! I've heard of people in Liyue with horns, but I've never gotten to meet one in person!
Those horns, ~name~... They're so beautiful! I-If you don't mind me asking, are they sensitive at all...?
♫ Here's a little lesson in trickery / This is going down in history ♫
