case.state: ...W-Wait, are we all idols? Is this just a personal show for ~player~...?
♫ Sisters, below, below / We're going where the winds don't blow ♫
♫ Sure, I'll be your marionette / Here, tug on my thread ♫
♫ I've got to forgive that love thief / Because I'm just a nice and likable girl♫
♫ Reaching out with both hands, a puzzle making no progress / It gets left behind until us two meet by chance ♫
♫ Even if you struggle, make it work somehow / Let it happen, easy breezy ♫
♫ Please don't say you are "lazy" / Because it will drive me crazy ♫
♫ Not if you're short of breath / I'm the disaster of passion ♫
♫ Two lovers, forbidden from one another / A war divides their people ♫
♫ "I love you" is something you never say / Couldn't get it out, always just pulled away ♫
♫ This love deterrence won't stand in my way / The game we're playing has just begun ♫
♫ Red tomorrow, red today / Dread, sorrow, can't turn away ♫
♫ A melody was effortlessly free / But now I only see an empty diary ♫
♫ When you walk away / You don't hear me say... ♫
♫ I've finally found what I was looking for / A place where I can be without remorse ♫
Designs from Inazuma are so interesting. I'd love to wear one during a performance!
I'm glad you joined us tonight, ~name~. Inazumans need good times right now more than anybody else.
How are things over in Inazuma right now, ~name~? Are you still dealing with that "Vision Hunt Decree"...?
Inazuma... The land ruled by the Electro Archon. I-Isn't it a little dangerous for those of us with Hydro Visions?
No matter what may be happening in Inazuma right now, ~name~, I'm sure the Archons have good reasons.
I've heard tell of a phenomenon known as "Electro Water" in Inazuma. I-I hope nothing similar happens when I use my Vision...
The Raiden Shogun seems really strict compared to Barbatos. At least you still have your Vision, ~name~.
Do you think Inazuma would be accepting of my performances, ~name~?
I love indulging in Liyue cuisine. How would you feel if it was a little spicier, ~name~...?
Rex Lapis seems a little more hands-on than Barbatos. Er, well... He seemed that way...
I hope everything that's happened in Liyue isn't troubling you, ~name~. I'm sorry for what happened to Rex Lapis...
I've heard tell of a Liyue girl putting on performances with a guitar. Some people have said we even sound similar...
Apparently there's a young zombie girl roaming around in Liyue. I wish I could help her, but my Vision only works on the living...
The mountainous geography of Liyue is really interesting... But it sure is difficult to climb...
I've heard of an amber that can trap people in Liyue... As somebody who gets frozen somewhat often, it sounds pretty unpleasant...
I hope I can meet one of the mystical beasts that live in Liyue someday.

I go up on the stage all the time, Nagisa. It's difficult at first, but you just need to keep at it. More than anything, I can assure you that the crowd wants you to succeed. Don't let their gaze scare you.
I'm glad we're of the same mind. Making others happy, even when it's difficult... That's what I strive for. Oh, but it's important not to forget about your own happiness along the way.
Her name is Jean. I... wish I could agree with you, Nagisa, but the truth is that I don't know her very well. Our parents separated when we were very young, you see...

It's not about winning or losing, Nagisa. That's what I've been trying to tell you. It's about having fun and making the most of what you're given, whether you succeed or you fail. In that regard, I think you're doing a wonderful job.
That's adorable, Nagisa! It's important to do things for yourself, too, not just for other people. If wearing those makes you feel cute, I think that's incredible. Thank you for sharing with us.
A-Ah, of course. This situation is far too exciting for me to even think about dozing off... I wouldn't want to miss everything you have to show me.
T-Take your time, Nagisa! Or... don't, if that's what you prefer! I'm rooting for you either way!
A choir club? My, I would love to participate in that. What draws you to the drama club? Are you perhaps interested in becoming an actress?
Is that so...? Then how did you hear about it in the first place? It must be quite rare if you can't find a script...
Thank you, Nagisa. But make sure to think of yourself, too. I-I don't mean to offend you, but you do look a little frail. If you ever get hurt, I'll patch you up right away.
W-Well, this is strip poker, Nagisa... Though I promise that I haven't been looking at you in that way. When you're the one who's stripping, I simply can't help but look at you...
W-What? Y-You can say whatever you want to, but I only mean that I hope this game is making you a little more comfortable in your own body...
Hmm, you might be right about that... A-At least, the nudity part. Public baths usually don't involve so much... self-pleasuring...
Ah, hmm... ♫ Resist, allow your heart to take you / Never let this merciless world erase you / The light of the torch shall guide you / And you will be bathed in the light! ♫
Ehehe, I'd be happy to. But first, I did want to ask -- have you ever been interested in working as an idol? You've certainly got the appearance for it.
I think you're right... Gosh, your confidence is admirable. I almost wish you could lend some of it to me.
That's not very nice, is it? I really had a lot of fun talking to you, but now it feels like you were just trying to make me look like an idiot...
And you came up with that by yourself? Making an entirely new form of magic... I couldn't even imagine what that's like.
Oh, you have a sister? Me too! She's very kind and hard working... Almost too hard working at times. What about yours?
Y-Your blade is very pretty, ~name~, but aren't you worried about hurting somebody...?
T-That's a very nice blade, ~name~, but please try to avoid hurting anybody...
U-Umm... Am I supposed to look? Are idols allowed to watch each other like this...?
